column16: 2015 at friends homes guilford. visitation will be friday
column18: from 6:30 p. m. until 8:00 p. m. at forbis & dick guilford chapel. a memorial service will be held at 10:00 a. m.
column20: june 13 in the living room at friends homes guilford. joe was born at home in greensboro on november 19
column21: 1913 and was a life long resident of greensboro. he was the son of the late david edgar and epsie hendricks allred. he was preceded in death by his beloved wife of 63 years
column26: sara and margaret. he is survived by his sons
column30: erin allred. he is also survived by sister-in-law
column33: along with nieces and nephews who loved him very much. joe was in the first graduating class at greensboro senior high (grimsley). he worked at pegram west
column34: inc. from 1950 until he retired as president in 1986. he will be remembered for living his life guided by his strong faith and quaker principles. he was instrumental in the development of friends home
column35: inc. and was a board member for many years. he was a generous man who never wanted credit for his many acts of kindness. his family wishes to extend gratitude for the love and exceptional care provided by the staff and caregivers at friends homes guilford. in lieu of flowers
column36: memorial contributions may be made to friends homes resident assistance fund
column40: or the humane society of the piedmont
column43: nc 27409. online condolences may be offered at www. forbisanddick. com
